element.name: T_objectWithIdAndLocation
element.short: Abstract type for objects with an ID and a location

element.name: T_tokenLocation
element.short: Token location, linking to a package
element.descr: This is used virtually everywhere. All tokens have a location, which can be used for error feedbacks and inspection calls.

element.name: T_searchTokenLocation
element.short: Token location, using a filename instead of a package
